Text.Name: Gong_1_Shui
Text.DisplayName: Loi sur les Seize Etapes Suprêmes
Text.Desc: Une des principales Lois élémentaires de la secte Taiyi, comprenant 4 états et 16 limites différentes qui nécessitent une progression étape par étape. Il n'est pas facile d'atteindre un état supérieur dans cette loi, mais il ne faut pas grand chose pour commencer. Vous ferez des progrès constants dans la culture, et l'immortalité pourrait bien arriver.
Text.SelectDesc: Cette loi exige une progression étape par étape et surtout une base stable, mais vous devez faire l'expérience de la première tribulation lors de la formation du noyau. Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir suivre cette loi?
Text.Stages.0.Desc: The first state on this Law. Requires a peaceful mind and a long time of meditation. It is harder for an intelligent person to banish thoughts from their mind and pass this state.
Text.Stages.0.Necks.0.Desc: Concentrate one's mind and banish other random thoughts in meditation. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough will be more difficult for characters with high intelligence.[/color]
Text.Stages.0.Necks.1.Desc: After concentration, further perceive the internal change in one's body, like a blind person feeling their surroundings, and finally reach the state of being able to sense the condition of one's internal organs. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough will be more difficult for characters with high intelligence.[/color]
Text.Stages.0.Necks.2.Desc: As introspection progresses, one will be able to find the first Qi Sense in meditation. It is the beginning of Stamina Conversion, which is called the 'First Perception'. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough will be more difficult for characters with low Qi sense. \nFailing to breakthrough may lead to injury.[/color]
Text.Stages.0.Necks.3.Desc: In this state, you need to gradually increase inner Qi and drive it through the Governing and Conception Vessels to create an inner cycle. This is called the 'Universal Cycle'.
Text.Stages.1.Desc: The second state in this Law. Requires risking one's life for a regulation between Water and Fire, in order to form one Golden Core.
Text.Stages.1.Necks.0.Desc: Open up the mind gate to connect with heaven and earth. Leave all the worldly troubles behind.
Text.Stages.1.Necks.1.Desc: Let Qi flow freely throughout one's whole body, allowing you to reach a state of completeness.
Text.Stages.1.Necks.2.Desc: Build an inner cauldron for core shaping using one's chest and abdomen as the cauldron, heart as fire, kidney as water, and life as fuel. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Constitution. \nFailing to breakthrough may lead to injury.[/color]
Text.Stages.1.Necks.3.Desc: Combine one's energy, Qi and spirit into one Golden Core, making it the foundation of the Law.
Text.Stages.2.Desc: The third state in this Law. Return to one's original and purest nature. One shall free one's mind and realize true self in this state.
Text.Stages.2.Necks.0.Desc: Thunder of Tribulation will befall you after the formation of Golden Core.
Text.Stages.2.Necks.1.Desc: One's true self gradually forms inside the Golden Core, as if in the earliest stage of prenatal development. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Intelligence.[/color]
Text.Stages.2.Necks.2.Desc: One's true self slowly comes into shape and is ready to grow. [color=#D06508]This breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Constitution.[/color]
Text.Stages.2.Necks.3.Desc: One's purest form in the Innerspirit starts to break through the confines of the mortal body, entering into a state of near immortality on earth.
Text.Stages.3.Desc: The fourth state in this Law. The Innerspirit will survive the Thunder of Tribulation, become a being of pure Yang, leave the mortal body behind and ascend as an Immortal.
Text.Stages.3.Necks.0.Desc: Forge one's spirit with the Goddess of Earth's pure Yin breaths.
Text.Stages.3.Necks.1.Desc: Break away from one's mortal body and let the spirit roam the world. [color=#D06508]\nNote that breaking through will greatly damage one's lifespan.[/color]
Text.Stages.3.Necks.2.Desc: Enlighten one's spirit with the blessing of heaven. One will face the Heavenly Tribulation after breaking this limit. [color=#D06508]\nIt is extremely difficult to break through, and there will not be any XP Bonus.[/color]
Text.Stages.3.Necks.3.Desc: Survive the curse of tribulation from heaven and earth and ascend toward immortality. Otherwise, it will obliterate one's entire existence.
